House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00087
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING INSTRUCTIONAL MATERIALS' ALLOWANCE FOR PUBLIC SCHOOL TEACHERS
ABSTRACT : Provides instructional allowance amounting to three thousand pesos (P3,000,00) per month for public school teachers of basic and higher education nationwide, subject to regular adjustment every five (5) years.
